description:
lib9/utf/utf.h: Remove superfluous header inclusion.
<stdint.h> does not seem to be needed.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

On Sun, Mar 31, 2013 at 12:25 PM, <lucio.dere@gmail.com> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev1,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> lib9/utf/utf.h: Remove superfluous header inclusion.
> <stdint.h> does not seem to be needed.
>
> Please review this at https://codereview.appspot.**com/8178044/<https://codereview.appspot.com/8178044/>
>
> Affected files:
>   M src/lib9/utf/utf.h
>
>
> Index: src/lib9/utf/utf.h
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/lib9/utf/utf.h
> +++ b/src/lib9/utf/utf.h
> @@ -16,8 +16,6 @@
>  #ifndef _UTFH_
>  #define _UTFH_ 1
>
> -#include <stdint.h>
> -
>  typedef unsigned int Rune;     /* Code-point values in Unicode 4.0 are 21
> bits wide.*/
>
>  enum
>
>
> --
>

> .
>

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=354db178ad99 ***

lib9/utf: Remove superfluous header inclusion.

<stdint.h> does not seem to be needed.

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/8178044

Committer: Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org>

subject: code review 8178044: lib9/utf/utf.h: Remove superfluous header inclusion.
